entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
